name_left: Center,Canal View, Private Bathroom
description_left:
((I have a minimum 3 night stay policy. 1 or 2 night stays is available on request only, send me email))

The room is on the first floor at the front side of our four floor apartment in a renovated canal house, which dates from 1930. It has a lovely canal view.

The room (22m2)has a private shower and toilet, directly accessible from the room; tv, free WI-FI, a king size double bed, fridge, coffee and tea facilities. Weekly and monthly rate available.

The space
((I have a minimum 3 night stay policy. 1 or 2 night stays is available on request only, send me email))

The room is on the first floor at the front side of a renovated canal house, which dates from 1930. It has a lovely canal view.

The room (22m2)has a private shower and toilet, directly accessible from the room; tv, free WI-FI, a king size double bed, fridge, coffee and tea facilities.

Weekly and monthly rate available.

Our home is locat
neighborhood_overview_left:
Residents live in the heart of the city - but that does mean avoiding the occasional wayward tourists on bicycles or revelling party-goers. With the building of the Amsterdam Public Library, one can not only enjoy one of Europe's largest public collections but also the expansive view of Amsterdam Centre from the roof-top caf√©.

Southeast of Centraal Station, Oudezijds lays between the city's red carpet Damrak and the scenic Oude Schans canal. It is capped on its southern end by the River Amstel. The Red Light District only takes up a small portion: within a triangle roughly formed by Centraal Station and the two main squares, Dam and Nieuwmarkt.
host_about_left: I lived in Switserland and London(UK) before I moved to Amsterdam. I also have a job in a small boutique hotel in Amsterdam. My partner and I hope to welcome you soon in our house in Amsterdam

Big bed quiet room, private bathroom + mini fridge, tea and coffee making facilities. I provide towels and hair-dryer and bed are made.

The space

Weekly and monthly rate available.

name_left: Your own cottage in the countryside
description_left:
Zunderdorp is a little 17th century village near Amsterdam. In your B&B cottage you have your private bathroom and a breakfast room.
Visit the town centre (15 minutes by bus) or the countryside with several villages like Broek in Waterland, Volendam

The space
Zunderdorp is a little 17th century village near Amsterdam. In your B&B cottage you have your private bathroom and a breakfast room.
Visit the town centre (15 minutes by bus) or the countryside with several villages like Broek in Waterland, Volendam and Zaanse Schans. The cows are your neighbours and you will find a golf court next door. Free parking.

You have a room with a unlimited view on the countryside. Free bicycles and cycle route maps available. Visit the area where Rembrandt made his drawings.

You can also use the diningroom-livingroom which you share with other guests. Around the house is a big terrace.

Amsterdam center is easy to reach by public transpo
host_about_left:
Living in the countryside, just near Amsterdam is great fun. We live between the meadows in a very quet area and at the same time a great city is at armlength.  
My profession is IT projectmanager, and I am a local historian and a musician, playing the trombone in the local orchestra. Together with my wife Annemieke we run the B&B.

name_left: Kiki's Loft Apartment
description_left:
The space
This impressive space, accessed directly via the ground floor entrance, sleeps 4 and 2 extra beds for children. The spacious living room has large windows that face the quiet street on the front, and the open Bulthaup kitchen that is fully equipped centers the expansive living room of the apartment.

In the back there are two large bedrooms: a master bedroom with a king size bed, as well as a spare twin bed, which is pulled out, and a smaller bedroom with a double bed. Both rooms have access to a large patio, great for outside dining when the weather allows!

There is a large, luxurious bathroom with floor heating, bath, walk-in shower and sink, and a separate toilet and additional storage space for suitcases and such, in the hallway.

THE LOCATION
Located on a quiet street between the Amstel River and the Utrechtsestraat, you‚Äôll have best of both worlds in this area. The Utrechtsestraat is lovely, classy shopping street, with i
host_about_left: We used to manage a company in changing/redeveloping old buildings into apartments in Amsterdam, The Netherlands. Over the last years we have been focussing on renting furnished houses, apartments and studio's to people from all over the world. Our strength is to provide you a home even if it is temporary!

name_right: Kiki's Garden View Apartment 01
description_right:
The space
This light, grand apartment with spacious living sleeps 4 adults and 2 extra beds for children. The living room in the front has big windowed doors that open to a French balcony with street views. There is a comfortable lounge area with wide screen TV.

The two bedrooms in the back both have access to a loggia balcony, to enjoy breakfast in the morning sun. The fully equipped Bulthaup kitchen, as well as the design bathroom with floor heating, bath, walk-in shower and sink, gives the apartment a very luxurious feel. There is separate toilet and additional storage space for suitcases and such, in the hallway.

THE LOCATION
Located on a quiet street between the Amstel River and the Utrechtsestraat, you‚Äôll have best of both worlds in this area. The Utrechtsestraat is lovely, classy shopping street, with its boutiques, caf√©‚Äôs and restaurants. For your daily groceries there is an Albert Heijn supermarket a stone‚Äôs throw away from the apartment
host_about_right: We used to manage a company in changing/redeveloping old buildings into apartments in Amsterdam, The Netherlands. Over the last years we have been focussing on renting furnished houses, apartments and studio's to people from all over the world. Our strength is to provide you a home even if it is temporary!

The two bedrooms in the back both have access to a loggia balcony, to enjoy breakfast in the morning sun. The fully equipped Bulthaup kitchen, as well as the design bathroom with floor heating, bath, walk-in shower and sink, gives the apartment a very luxurious feel.

There is separate toilet and additional storage space for suitcases and such, in the hallway.

THE LOCATION
Located on a quiet street between the Amstel River and the Utrechtsestraat, you‚Äôll have best of both worlds in this area. The Utrechtsestraat is lovely, classy shopping street, with its boutiques, caf√©‚Äôs and restaurants. For your daily groceries there is an Albert Heijn supermarket a stone‚Äôs throw away
host_about_left: We used to manage a company in changing/redeveloping old buildings into apartments in Amsterdam, The Netherlands. Over the last years we have been focussing on renting furnished houses, apartments and studio's to people from all over the world. Our strength is to provide you a home even if it is temporary!

description_right:
The space
This impressive space, accessed directly via the ground floor entrance, sleeps 4 and 2 extra beds for children. The spacious living room has large windows that face the quiet street on the front, and the open Bulthaup kitchen that is fully equipped centers the expansive living room of the apartment.

In the back there are two large bedrooms: a master bedroom with a king size bed, as well as a spare twin bed, which is pulled out, and a smaller bedroom with a double bed. Both rooms have access to a large patio, great for outside dining when the weather allows!

There is a large, luxurious bathroom with floor heating, bath, walk-in shower and sink, and a separate toilet and additional storage space for suitcases and such, in the hallway.

name_left: Stylish, clean studio, high service
description_left:
Stylish, sunny, clean room on the second floor with private bathroom and a beautiful view in Amsterdam Zuidoost. The room has a fridge and a comfortable desk to work on. The entertainment area, the Arena, the AMC and the Airport are nearby. Very comfortable for those who travel to A'dam for business or study. And I love to offer high service.
Due to the coronavirus, we regularly disinfect all surfaces that are often touched.

The space
Stylish room on the second floor with private bathroom with a beautiful view.
Near the Bijlmer Boulevard entertainment area (10 minutes walk): Heineken Music Hall, the Arena, Ziggo Dome, Pathe Arena Cinema‚Äôs. Don‚Äôt miss a show.
Apartment is located in a quiet neighborhood in Amsterdam Zuidoost. (10 minutes naar Waterloostation by metro).
Available: private bathroom, frige, microwave, coffeemachine, tv and free wifi.
Two beds; 90 x 200. You also have access to the main kitchen. This is shared with the owner
neighborhood_overview_left: The Bijlmer is a special area with a predomi nantly African / Surinamese population. You will find exotic markets, Asian shops and restaurants with original dishes. It's a real melting pot of cultures. You'll also find the headquarters of major companies. So if you are here for business,  my apartment might just be what you are looking for. This neighborhood  is a spacious area with lots of greenery and nature just around the corner.
host_about_left:
I am a photographer based in Amsterdam, a great city. I live here with my  beloved doggie Ella.
If you want to explore Amsterdam I'll gladly be your guide . I've lived here for over 35 years now and know many original locations.
My house is located in the Bijlmer, 10 minutes by metro to the historic city. It is the entertainment center. Here is the Arena where big concerts are given by world famous stars, the Heineken Music Hall and the Ziggo Dome. It is a very special area with a predominantly African , Surinamese population. Here you'll find great restaurants and exotic markets .
I look forward to welcoming you.
Simone Henken

Very comfortable and cosy for those who travel to A'dam for business or college.

name_left: Casa Vrolik,  Amsterdam, Oost,  BnB 2pp
description_left:
Your own den in Amsterdam - Oost! Here you can book the double room for 2 with a small dining area on the same floor. There is a 1 pp room on the same floor. Guests share their own shower, bathroom and kitchenette as well as the sitting area.

If you fly into Europe, i'd love it if you'd compensate for your CO2-emisssion. When you let me know you did i will give you a little discount. Also let me know when you travel by train or bus instead of taking the car or flying within Europe. : )

The space
Hello!

I have two rooms to offer at the moment for BnB customers who want to enjoy Amsterdam from their own little den in Amsterdam-Oost. Here you can make a reservation for the double room that sleeps two persons. For the single room, please check the other listing under Casa Vrolik Amsterdam. Ofcourse you can also book this room for one, or both rooms - when available - for up to 3pp.

The house I live in with cat Roky and cat Sproetj
neighborhood_overview_left: The East Side of town is becoming more and more a studentfriendly part of town. College and University are expanding on this side of the river Amstel, and coffee bars and cafes are popping up. Our Oosterparkbuurt has a nice feel to it. Outside there is a lot to explore, and the Centre is not far away on bike, with tram or on foot. 'Oost got the most'.
host_about_left:
I came to Amsterdam as a student and I worked with youngsters (8 to 19 yrs old) for the last two decades till 2014 ( in Dutch: Ik werkte met jongeren de laatste 20 jaar en verliet de jeugdzorg in 2014).

 At 44 I started my own Soap business in Januari 2015: De Amsterdamsche Zeepfabriek B.V. The Amsterdam Soap Factory, in Amsterdam. A social firm where we make organic handmade soap bars in Amsterdam, with whoever needs the place to get back to work and to be with others while doing that. Based on 500 years of craftsmanship of soap making as it was big business in Old Amsterdam in 1550.

Born in Utrecht, in the early seventies, I moved to Amsterdam in '89 to live and study here, and I never left. Except for vacations abroad: California, Australia, London-city and hitchhiking through Europe. Oh, and then New York and Joshua Tree. And Seattle, Austin, Savannah and Santa Monica.. Closer to home I love Vlieland in September, and the Netherlands for camping out.. 

I was so lucky to get a chance to live in this house in the '90's: a small floor just for me with everything I needed. Then two friends came to live with me and we got another floor. And then I got the chance to redo the whole house (2nd, 3rd and 4th floor) with my father Bram and his mate Dion in 2011.

My house is now the most beautiful loft-house in Amsterdam. You might want to have a glass with me at the rooftop. I'll think about it ;)

The floor you'll stay on used to be for me and my two stepchildren: they moved on. I like to use the rooms for guests: come stay, and help me pay off the bank :)

name_left: Your own apartment on wheels
description_left:
The space
A large carriage is luxurious designed as a hotel room and located on a farm just outside Amsterdam. A unique way to become familiar with the life on a farm. A fresh farmer‚Äôs breakfast in the morning during the day you experience living on a farm and you can help the farmer with his work. Full corona proof with a private bathroom.

B&B Biest-stro can offer you this arrangement in a very surpising environment. The room is located in a large wagon on a nearby farm (see the picture).

The farmer and his son are milking a herd of 600 sheep twice a day and they are making cheese and yoghurt of het sheepsmilk. They appriciate it when you can help them milking or feeding the animals and they are very wiling to tell you about the life and work on the farm. Especially for children the stay will be an unforgettable experience.

The room has two double beds. In the wagen is a kitchen, a fridge, coffee and tea machines, heating and it has elec
host_about_left:
Living in the countryside, just near Amsterdam is great fun. We live between the meadows in a very quet area and at the same time a great city is at armlength.  
My profession is IT projectmanager, and I am a local historian and a musician, playing the trombone in the local orchestra. Together with my wife Annemieke we run the B&B.
property_type_left: Private room in bed and breakfast

name_right: Your little appartment on wheels
description_right:
A waggon luxurous designed as a hotel room on a farm at the border of Amsterdam. A unique way to experience living on a farm. Every morning a fresh breakfast with home made sheep's cheese and yoghurt.

The space
A waggon luxurious designed as a hotel room is located on a farm at the border of Amserdam. A unique way to get familiar with the life on a farm. Every morning a fresh breakfast with products of the farm and during the day you can assist the farmer with his work. The room has a double bed and an extra single bed above it. In the waggon is a kitchen, a fridge, coffee and tea equipment, heating, electricity and running water. It is ready to use with all bedlinen and towels available. The size of the car is 5 x 2 meters. The bathroom is in a seperate unit next to the waggon and is brandnew.
The family Kuiper milks around 600 sheep everyday and produces delicious cheese and yoghurt from that milk. They appriciate your help and like to tell about their wo
neighborhood_overview_right: Waterland is a beautiful countryside area, with a large variaty of birdlife. The godwit is the most famous bird that breeds in this unique and largest colony in Europe. A tour through the 17th century villages in Waterland is an unforgettable experience.
host_about_right:
Living in the countryside, just near Amsterdam is great fun. We live between the meadows in a very quet area and at the same time a great city is at armlength.  
My profession is IT projectmanager, and I am a local historian and a musician, playing the trombone in the local orchestra. Together with my wife Annemieke we run the B&B.

name_left: Rembrandt van Rijn apartment canal view
neighborhood_overview_left:
Spiegelkwartier

The Spiegelkwartier is the Art and Antiques district in Amsterdam.
Here you‚Äôll find more than 70 antiques dealers and art galleries, together offering a resplendent array of fine historical objects, classic and contemporary art, and exotic folk art.
You will find also restaurants, casual eateries and cosy caf√©s on almost every corner.
The Spiegelkwartier is located between the Herengracht and the Rijksmuseum.

www.spiegelkwartier.nl

Museum Quarter

The Amsterdam Museum Quarter is home to the three most important museums in the Netherlands: the Rijksmuseum, the Stedelijk Museum and the Van Gogh Museum.
It also houses the majestic Concertgebouw and some superb caf√©s and restaurants.
With its large grassy open area, the Museumplein offers plenty of room to have a picnic or just relax. The Museum Quarter even has its own indoor swimming pool.
And a visit isn‚Äôt complete without posing with, or on, th

name_left: Modern and exclusive room with free PP and bikes
description_left:
Modern exclusive room with stunning view of the park. Suitable for max. 2 persons. In a quiet neighborhood within walking distance of public transport tram and metro. Free parking in front of the house. Access via main house to private room with luxurious electrically adjustable box spring bed of 180 x 200 (can also be divided as 2 single beds), a rain shower, toilet, flat screen TV, coffee and tea fridge and microwave. Towels and bathrobes are provided. The bikes are free!

The space
This modern, bright, completely new, lovely studio with a great view on the Park and suitable to a maximum of 2 persons!

The studio is fitted with a double box spring bed (180 x 200), or two single beds. A small but all you need kitchen fully equipped with all the appliances for cooking. The bathroom comes with walk-in rain shower, toilet and bath furniture. Sorry but we have no time to serv you breakfast ;).
There is also free WiFi, Free Parking en free bikes!
host_about_left: We wonen sinds 2003 op deze fantastische plek in Amsterdam. Aan de rand van het park maar toch heel centraal bij Vondelpark en Leidseplein. De BB Parkview is gebouwd in 2013 aan het huis. Het is heerlijk en zeer interessant om gasten van over de hele wereld te mogen ontmoeten. Sommige worden zelfs vrienden, maar het is ook fijn om je eigen privacy te behouden. Hopelijk vinden gasten het net zo'n ideale stek als wij. Wij zouden het erg leuk vinden jullie hier te mogen verwelkomen.

name_right: Elegant private room with own bathroom and bikes!
description_right:
The space
This modern, bright, completely new, lovely apartment with a great view on the Park is suitable for only! two persons ( please don't ask and don't come with an extra person) The apartment is fitted with a double bed very comfortable and nice. A small but all you need kitchen fully equipped with all the appliances for cooking. The bathroom comes with walk-in rain shower, toilet and bath furniture as well all toiletries. There is also free Wi-Fi, Flat screen TV, Free Parking spot and a little garden ( shared with us! :)

Just a few minutes away from the Central City, Dam Square and Leidseplein. Very relaxing after a busy day shopping or visiting Musea. Nice to breath the fresh air, hear the birds singing and look at the nice view. The Apartment is only 10 minutes with metro to WTC and RAI, 15 min with train or metro to Schiphol and 20 minutes with tram to the Dam or central station. Amsterdam Center is an extremely popular destination because it combines

name_left: Vondel House, Guest Room 1
description_left:
Very comfortable and spacious 21m2 guestroom with a private shower and sink in a quiet neighbourhood for 2 people, close to the famous Vondelpark. In less than 15 minutes walking to the Museumplein en 10 minutes to the Leidseplein.

The space
Dear guest,

# Update January 2019: the rooms have undergone a complete revitalisation! See the pictures
# Update: digital TV in your room
# Update: powerfull WiFi, only to be used by the accommodation
# Guestroom 1 and 2 have their own small kitchenette. Each kitchenette has a refrigerator as well as a combi microwave/oven to prepare breakfast, lunch, microfood or cook water.
# Guestroom 1 and 2 have each their own private shower and sink
# Guestroom 1 and 2 are together suitable for 4 persons in total, but it's necessary to book both rooms if you want to come with 4 persons
#go to my profile and have a look at all my listings


Welcome and enjoy your stay in Guest Room
neighborhood_overview_left: This is a very lively neighbourhood close to the famous Vondelpark and with many restaurants around. A mere 10 minutes walk through the Vondelpark will bring you to the Museumplein with the Rijksmuseum and van Gogh museum. The neighbourhood is close to the centre, but it is not where the majority of the tourists stay.
host_about_left: Living in the same building as the apartment my core business is working as an architect. I regulary play squash and like good healthy food together with quality wine. I design and create kinematical mechanical art with modular systems like Meccano and FAC. Just invite yourself to my place and I will show you my work.

name_left: Comfortable sky room 12th floor
description_left:
Comfortable bedroom 1/2 persons on 12th floor of a 16th store flat in Rembrandtpark. Good public transport connections with Amsterdam centre with tram 1 and 17, metro 50 and bus 18 or nightbus 751/752. Self service breakfast.

The space
Enjoy your 'home' in Amsterdam! Energize with the bustling culture and joy of the city of Amsterdam to finally find peace and calm in the lusterous green surroundings of Rembrandtpark, sleeping sky high on 12th floor with beautiful panorama. See Amsterdam Light Festival in winter.

Guest access
Entrance Hall
Bedroom
Bathroom and toilet

Other things to note
Jog and run in Rembrandtpark and Vondelpark with Amsterdam locals. Rent a bicycle to see the city of Amsterdam like locals do.
If you need a personal car transfer from airport please let me know. You will be picked up 45 minutes after landing time, at the rightside of the busstation, at the pick and ride parking space.
neighborhood_overview_left: Rembrandtpark is a beautiful natural green park, from where the bustling shopping area Kinkerstraat is within reach, including Ten Kate market. Hip and trendy bars for drinking, lunch and diner are nearby.
host_about_left:
My name is Rick (51), living in and loving the wonderful city of Amsterdam. I work as a freelance controller, love to make and check financial plans in elaborate spreadsheets.  I like  practising yoga and meditation. I love singing in the Gay Men's Chorus of Amsterdam Manoeuvre. I enjoy travelling in exotic destinations like Cuba, India, Indonesia, Mexico, Iran, USA, Myanmar, Filippines and hopefully in the future Australia, South Africa and China. 
I LOVE the music of the Eurovision Song Contest and pop music of the 70's till now with favorites like ABBA, Whitney Houston, Diana Ross, Linda Ronstadt, Olivia Newton John and the Common Linnets. I simply love movies and tv series so Netflix has become a way of enjoying life even more next to cinema. Spiritual awareness of Life guides me.  
As a music hobby I do music as a dj at wedding parties, birthday celebrations and company meetings. 
Come and relax in my B&B room, I hope to give you a comfortable stay. I advise you to explore Amsterdam on a bike.  Feel@home in IAmsterdam!

name_right: Comfortable Sky Room for 1 or 2
description_right:
Beautiful view from 12th floor. Comfortable bedroom with kingsize bed for one or two persons. Good transportation connections with city center (15 mins). Transfer from airport on request. Comfort and peace.

The space
Enjoy your 'home' in Amsterdam! Energize with the bustling culture and joy of the city of Amsterdam to finally find calmth in the green Rembrandtpark, sleeping sky high on 12th floor with beautiful panorama. If you like love birds, I have a couple of parakeets or budgies, named Bj√∂rn & Benny. They love your company.

Guest access
Entrance Hall
Bedroom
Kitchen for breakfast
Bathroom and toilet
Balcony (for smoking)

Other things to note
I will welcome you, give you advise to get around in the city of Amsterdam, cultural life, nightlife, partys, public transport or bicycle (rent), to make your stay in Amsterdam comfortable. Enjoy company of my love birds Bj√∂rn & Benny in the living room.
neighborhood_overview_right: Slotervaart is an upcoming neighbourhood, with nice new coffee bars (Bartack, Coffee Company, Buongiorno Espresso) and restaurants (Edel, Ramada Apollo floor 17, Rembrandt Huiskamer) as well as nightlife (Sieraad, Club8).

name_left: Mystique Suite on top of Faralda Crane Hotel
description_left:
The Mystique suite is hidden on top of the highest monumental harbour crane

FARALDA CRANE HOTEL the mind blowing and a once in a live time experience. It‚Äôs excessive. You'll love it or you hate it.

Access is on request. Private & Invites only

Faralda Crane Hotel, the most Romantic & Inspiring place to stay

A panorama elevator to the top stops right into your suite.
Your stay is safe and #Corona proof

Enjoy your romantic and secret weekend.

The space
We call this suite our MYSTIQUE. This split level suite is the highest suite in our monumental Crane. This suite has two levels, with no less than 38 square meters.

The living and separate sleeping area are beautiful decorated and equipped with all amenities. Large windows provide an amazing view over Amsterdam and the river IJ. The first floor is a spacious living area, furnished with art and design furniture. Hidden behind a characteristi
neighborhood_overview_left:
Faralda Crane Hotel is a monumental landmark. This icon is located in the middle of the industrial NDSM heritage. The crane is one of the most significant developments of its time and has received unprecedented international media coverage and awards to herald its uniqueness.
The NDSM area is an industrial though thriving area. Some of Amsterdam most popular restaurants among locals are within walking distance. We have an extensive list of those restaurants and other things to do waiting for you!
host_about_left:
Hi my name is Edwin, owner of Faralda Crane Hotel.
You're welcome in the Crane, the most Inspiring and romantic place to stay
I love to meet free spirits and open minded people who appreciate this excessive monumental buillding

name_left: Room 1-Jordaan canal/Pool Table/Spa bath/Roof area
description_left:
On a main canal in the Jordaan, near Anne Franks house.

Guests can use pool table; piano; spa bath; baby roof area; kitchen; massage chair; internet; sports equipment; 16 boats out front for hire, no license required.

Centrally located, 15 minutes ish to Westerpark (right), Leidseplein/Vondelpark (left), Dam Sqr (Sout East), we are in the centre of it all :-)

2 expats live here. Guests: live like a local, you will be our flatmate for the time you are here - make yourself at home :-)

The space
Main canal, 16 boats out front for public to hire, pool table, spa bath, piano, baby roof area, massage chair, internet available in every room. There is sport equipment you may use ie. for Bodypump (follow along with an online class using the projector for life size visuals), bosu ball and three yoga mats.

3 guests in the room might be possible. Please inquire.

We are located on floors 3 to 5:
3rd floor is the lo
neighborhood_overview_left: Quiet and safe. Only locals come down this canal due to the entry and exit points, and only local houses in between. The next street is where the action is. Neighbours are mainly Dutch and very friendly. A neighbourhood full of friends.
host_about_left: Contracting for 14 years has allowed me the flexibility and freedom to travel often, and for long periods. 101 countries over all 7 continents, I've learned what makes me appreciate lodgings the most and hope to offer my guests the same. Guests are treated as housemates, so enjoy the local life, while also cleaning up after yourself ;-)

name_left: Room in a charming canal house - 22
description_left:
Stay where all Amsterdamer want to live. Cheerful bright room in a historic canal house. Close to many museums & the Rembrandsplein & yet wonderfully quiet. Private room: 1 or 2 bed, shower (ensuite), toilet in the hall to be shared with 1 other private room.

We invite all our guests for a free continental breakfast: Every morning - but only from 08:20 h - 10:00 h (am) in the breakfast room facing the Keizersgracht.

The space
Private room with 1 or 2 standard beds ‚Ä¢ shower ensuite. The toilet to share with 1 other private room.
If you book with 2 beds they can not be arranged together as a double bed!
Situated on the 2nd floor - no lift!!!

There are up to six rooms available in our guesthouse with a max of 10 guests.

Free Wifi

Guest access
Guests have their own keys for the house. You can come and go any time you like.
The dayroom (facing the Keizersgracht) and pantry are opened to our guests
neighborhood_overview_left:
Quite neighborhood - and we are sure our guests love that too!

Walking distance to Rembrandsplein, Hermitage, Jewish Histoircal Museum, Amsterdam Museum, Rijkmuseum, Van Gogh and Stedelijk Museum.
Opera and Carre Theater are just around the corner. On the Utrechtsestraat a lot of restaurants. Take aways close-by.

De Pijk quarter is begins 15 min walking from us.
host_about_left: Since 2002 I am in charge of the management of a  little guesthouse of the "Deutsches Seemannsheim" foundation. We are a small team and we want that you have a good time in Amsterdam. If you have question about the city - ask us.  However, you are also invited to live your privacy during your stay in our house. Our guesthouse is part of the worldwide network of the "German Seamen's Mission".

name_left: 3 Person Room with Stunning Canal View!
description_left:
This centrally located, cosy hotel is housed in an authentic Dutch canal house built in 1652. The room has an en-suite bathroom and a stunning canal view. There's free Wi-Fi and the city's finest cocktail bar is next door!

The space
The room has three single beds and an en-suite bathroom with a washbasin, toilet and a shower. There is central heating, a TV and Wi-Fi which you can use at your convenience.

Guest access
You will be given a set of keys that will allow you to come and go any time you please.

Other things to note
Please be aware: we have a small elevator in the building which can be used to get to the room. However we ask our guests not to use it after 23:00. After this time you must climb two flights of winding stairs to get to the room, therefore it is not suitable for people with physical disabilities or people with general mobility issues.

We don't have full-time reception staff so you will n
neighborhood_overview_left:
The hotel is situated on the Singel canal, this is the oldest canal on the famous Amsterdam canal ring and served as a moat around the city until 1585. Within walking distance there are countless things to see and do. In no less than five minutes you can walk to the Dam square and the Royal Palace. The flower market, Anne Frank's house and the Red Light District are all close by. Want to do some shopping? The famous 'Nine Streets' and the Jordaan area are just minutes away. For the foodies among you, there are some outstanding restaurants to enjoy. As far as the location goes you really can't get much better in Amsterdam. And to finish it off: no more than three steps from the hotel is Tales & Spirits, recently voted Amsterdam's best cocktail bar!

When we confirm your booking we'll send you a guidebook in PDF format with details about your accommodation and some recommendations for things to see and do in the area.

The flower market, Anne Frank's house and the Red Light District are all close by. Want to do some shopping? The famous 'Nine Streets' and the Jordaan area are just minutes away. For the foodies among you, there are some outstanding restaurants to enjoy. As far as the location goes you really can't get much better in Amsterdam. And to finish it off: no more than three steps from the hotel is Tales & Spirits, recently voted Amsterdam's best cocktail bar!

When we confirm your booking we'll send you a guidebook in PDF format with details about your accommodation and some recommendations for things to see and do in the area.

The room has two single beds and an en-suite bathroom with a washbasin, toilet, shower and bathtub. There is central heating, a TV and Wi-Fi which you can use at your convenience.

Guest access
You will be given a set of keys that will allow you to come and go any time you please.

Other things to note
Please be aware: we have a small elevator in the building which can be used to get to the room. However we ask our guests not to use it after 23:00. After this time you must climb four flights of winding stairs to get to the room, therefore it is not suitable for people with physical disabilities or people with general mobility issues.

We don't have full-time reception staff so you
neighborhood_overview_right:
The hotel is situated on the Singel canal, this is the oldest canal on the famous Amsterdam canal ring and served as a moat around the city until 1585. Within walking distance there are countless things to see and do. In no less than five minutes you can walk to the Dam square and the Royal Palace. The flower market, Anne Frank's house and the Red Light District are all close by. Want to do some shopping? The famous 'Nine Streets' and the Jordaan area are just minutes away. For the foodies among you, there are some outstanding restaurants to enjoy. As far as the location goes you really can't get much better in Amsterdam. And to finish it off: no more than three steps from the hotel is Tales & Spirits, recently voted Amsterdam's best cocktail bar!

When we confirm your booking we'll send you a guidebook in PDF format with details about your accommodation and some recommendations for things to see and do in the area.

name_left: Work From Home Retreat in ‚ô• of Old Town
description_left:
Welcome to our home - modern living in a piece of 17th century history! We live in a three-floor corner apartment located in Amsterdam's old center district. Every major attraction is within walking distance. There are two comfortable desks in the house and speedy wi-fi which makes this the perfect work from home retreat. Please read the full listing and let us know if you have any questions!

The space
‚òû We live on the property - you will be sharing the living room/kitchen with us. ‚òú

‚òû Due to Covid-19 we are currently open for longer term stays - get in touch and let us know your dates! ‚òú

Includes:
‚úî Spacious kitchen with full appliances and utensils
‚úî Nespresso coffee machine with unlimited pods
‚úî Selection of tea & cereals
‚úî 1 bedroom sleeping 2 in total
‚úî 2 toilets, 1 shower - good water pressure
‚úî Sun facing - direct sunlight all day ‚òÄ
‚úî Sound insulating windows in bedrooms
‚úî Central heating, free
neighborhood_overview_left:
Anne Frank House: 15 min walk
Rijksmuseum & Van Gogh museum: 15 min walk
Nine Streets shopping area: 5 min walk
Rembrandt square: 7 min walk
Red Light District: 9 min walk
RAI conference centre: 10 min by metro
Kalverstraat (shopping street): 1 min walk
Leidseplein (nightlife square): 9 min walk
Amsterdam Centraal (train station): 19 min walk (or 10 min by metro)
Schiphol Airport: 30 min taxi ride (or 30 min train & metro)
host_about_left: Happily married couple living together in the vibrant city of Amsterdam! Julia-Beth is originally from Cape Town, South Africa. After studying graphic design and working as a layout artist she moved to the Netherlands in 2011 where she met Daniel at a mutual friend‚Äôs barbeque. She recently earned a degree in Fashion Design from the Amsterdam Fashion Institute and now works in an art gallery close to our house. Daniel is an Amsterdam native with British roots. In 2013 he finished a degree in documentary filmmaking at the Utrecht School of Arts. He's now a freelance filmmaker and entrepreneur.

name_right: Work From Home Retreat in ‚ô• of Old Town
description_right:
Welcome to our home - modern living in a piece of 17th century history! We live in a three-floor corner apartment located in Amsterdam's old center district. Every major attraction is within walking distance. There are two comfortable desks in the house and speedy wi-fi which makes this the perfect work from home retreat. Please read the full listing and let us know if you have any questions!

The space
‚òû We live on the property - you will be sharing the living room/kitchen with us. ‚òú

‚òû Due to Covid-19 we are currently open for longer term stays - get in touch and let us know your dates! ‚òú

Includes:
‚úî Spacious kitchen with full appliances and utensils
‚úî Nespresso coffee machine with unlimited pods
‚úî Selection of tea & cereals
‚úî 1 bedroom sleeping 2 in total
‚úî 2 toilets, 1 shower - good water pressure
‚úî Sun facing - direct sunlight all day ‚òÄ
‚úî Sound insulating windows in bedrooms
‚úî Central heating, free
neighborhood_overview_right:
Anne Frank House: 15 min walk
Rijksmuseum & Van Gogh museum: 15 min walk
Nine Streets shopping area: 5 min walk
Rembrandt square: 7 min walk
Red Light District: 9 min walk
RAI conference centre: 10 min by metro
Kalverstraat (shopping street): 1 min walk
Leidseplein (nightlife square): 9 min walk
Amsterdam Centraal (train station): 19 min walk (or 10 min by metro)
Schiphol Airport: 30 min taxi ride (or 30 min train & metro)
host_about_right: Happily married couple living together in the vibrant city of Amsterdam! Julia-Beth is originally from Cape Town, South Africa. After studying graphic design and working as a layout artist she moved to the Netherlands in 2011 where she met Daniel at a mutual friend‚Äôs barbeque. She recently earned a degree in Fashion Design from the Amsterdam Fashion Institute and now works in an art gallery close to our house. Daniel is an Amsterdam native with British roots. In 2013 he finished a degree in documentary filmmaking at the Utrecht School of Arts. He's now a freelance filmmaker and entrepreneur.

name_left: Luxury Flowermarket Apartment
description_left:
Step straight into Amsterdam's history, with this guestroomsituated in a unique 17th century Amsterdam monument! Ideally located in the city centre of Amsterdam, next to the Singel, the canal famous for the only floating flower market in the world.

The space
This modern and luxury designed guestroom of 45 m¬≤ (484 ft¬≤) is a great choice for modern-day travelers interested in exploring Amsterdam to the fullest, on their own or as a group up to two people.

This monumental building is completely renovated and restyled in 2015/2016 and is now a blend of characteristic features and contemporary furnishings. The high ceiling provide a lot of natural daylight. The design is chique, cozy (or ‚Äúgezellig‚Äù as we say in Dutch) and comfortable, creating a friendly and relaxed environment.

The accommodation comes with free Wi-Fi and can accommodate up to two guests. It has it's own patio on the ground floor. The large living area is provided with a flat-scr
neighborhood_overview_left:
Amsterdam is a city born for biking and walking. There are many sights to explore in the surroundings, such as the Flower market (50 m), Leidsestraat (220 m), Nieuwe Spiegelstraat art galleries (400 m), Rembrandtplein (450 m), The 9 Streets shopping district (650 m), Leidseplein (750 m), Royal Palace at Dam Square (850 m), the Rijksmuseum, Van Gogh Museum and Vondelpark (1 km) and the Anne Frank House (1,7 km). Central Station is located at 2 km, RAI Amsterdam (4,8 km and 15 min by taxi) and Schiphol Airport is at 15 km from the property.

The nearest supermarket (Albert Heijn at Koningsplein) is only 2 minutes away and the tram lines 1, 2 and 5 are the same distance. Trams 4, 9, 16 and 24 do stop at Muntplein and are at 3 minutes walking distance. In the center of the buzzing nightlife, several bars, LGBT venues, restaurants and two Path√© cinemas (including the historic Art Deco movie theater Tuschinski) can be found within a radius of 200 m.
host_about_left:
Dear traveler,

I'm Saskia and together with my partner Michiel we offer our lovely apartment up for rent.
We are a nice couple with no kids and no pets. We love to travel ourselves and because of the great experiences we had staying in b&b's, we love to give that in return for other travelers.
We hope you have a great stay at one of the most beautiful places in town.

Regards,
Saskia and Michiel

name_left: Hotel in the heart of Amsterdam 2p
description_left:
The hotel is located in a historic building with canal view in the Red Light District, just a few steps away from the Dam Square and Central Station, great bars en restaurants all around, free Wi-Fi acces, computer available, cable and satellite tv.

The space
The rates include breakfast.
Free safety lockers in every room (laptop size).

Guest access
the lobby, bar, smokingarea and the computer.

Other things to note
Blowdryer available at the lobby.

Shared showers and toilets. There is a shower and toilet on every floor. We are very hygienic, the sanitary facilities are cleaned twice a day.
neighborhood_overview_left:
The hotel is right in the centre of Amsterdam, the red light district, clubs, restaurants bars and (coffee)shops. Here a some of our favourites.
Shopping:
De Bijenkorf, Magna Plaza, PC Hoofdstraat, Albert Cuyp ( daily market ).
Sights:
Rijksmuseum, Van Gogh Museum, Anne Frankhuis.
Restaurants:
Burger Bar, Little Thai Prince, Thai Bird, Los Argentinos.

The hotel is located in a historic building with canal view in the Red Light District, just a few steps away from the Dam Square and Central Station, great bars en restaurants all around, free Wi-Fi acces, computer available, cable and satellite tv.

The space
The rates include breakfast.
Free safety lockers in every room (laptop size).

Guest access
the lobby, bar, smokingarea and the computer.

Other things to note
Blowdryer available at the lobby.

Shared showers and toilets. There is a shower and toilet on every floor. We are very hygienic, the sanitary facilities are cleaned twice a day.
neighborhood_overview_left:
The hotel is right in the centre of Amsterdam, the red light district, clubs, restaurants bars and (coffee)shops. Here a some of our favourites.
Shopping:
De Bijenkorf, Magna Plaza, PC Hoofdstraat, Albert Cuyp ( daily market ).
Sights:
Rijksmuseum, Van Gogh Museum, Anne Frankhuis.
Restaurants:
Burger Bar, Little Thai Prince, Thai Bird, Los Argentinos.
amenities_left: ["Wifi", "Iron", "Hot water", "Hangers", "Shampoo", "Dedicated workspace", "Dryer", "Essentials", "Cable TV", "Dishes and silverware", "Hair dryer", "TV", "Heating", "Washer", "Breakfast"]
name_right: Hotel in the heart of Amsterdam, Basement Room
description_right:
The hotel is located in a historic building with canal view in the Red Light District, just a few steps away from the Dam Square and Central Station, great bars en restaurants all around, free Wi-Fi acces, computer available, cable and satellite tv.

The space
The rates include breakfast.
Free safety lockers in every room (laptop size).
No windows in this room. It's a basement room.
The room does have a ventilation system.

Guest access
the lobby, bar, smokingarea and the computer.

Other things to note
No extra guests allowed. Only 3 persons per room.

The stairs here are steep. There is no elevator.

If you need a blowdryer make sure to ask for it at the lobby.

Shared showers and toilets. There is a shower and toilet on every floor. We are very hygienic, the sanitary facilities are cleaned twice a day.
neighborhood_overview_right:
The hotel is right in the centre of Amsterdam, the red light district, clubs, restaurants bars and (coffee)shops. Here a some of our favourites.
Shopping:
De Bijenkorf, Magna Plaza, PC Hoofdstraat, Albert Cuyp ( daily market ).
Sights:
Rijksmuseum, Van Gogh Museum, Anne Frankhuis.
Restaurants:
Burger Bar, Little Thai Prince, Thai Bird, Los Argentinos.

name_left: Green oasis in Amsterdam for 2 or 1
description_left:
The house is near Arena Stadion, Ziggo Dome, Heineken Music Hall, shops, metro and bus to the centre whithin 30 minutes. Behind the house there is a park. suitable for couples, solo-avonturiers, bussines people, familie and children.

The space
The bedroom with 2 single beds is on the second floor. There are 2 more bedrooms on this floor for the rental. The toilet and shower are shared. Nice view over the water and park.
It is not allowed to smoke or blow in the house.
De slaapkamer is op de 2e verdieping. Er zijn nog 2 slaapkamers op deze verdieping voor de verhuur. De wc en douche zijn gedeeld.
Het is niet toegestaan te roken in huis.

Guest access
kitchen, livingroom, garden, toilet/shower.
Owner has access to the living room and kitchen for the plants, thermostat stove and washing machine.
It is intended that these spaces remain neat , the owner appreciates this.

Other things to note
Er
neighborhood_overview_left:
Het is een rustige buurt met een park achter.
Lokale markt op dinsdag op 10 minuten lopen.
Kinderboerderij in het park.

It is a quiet area with a park behind.
Local market on Tuesday on a 10-minute walk away.
Petting Zoo in the park.
host_about_left:
Ik onderneem graag nieuwe dingen, en daar is Airbnb er 1 van. ik heb wel eens kamers aan studenten verhuurd, maar eigenlijk vind ik dit wel leuker. Ik vind het leuk om mijn huis gezellig te maken voor andere mensen zodat zij zich hier thuis voelen. 

Ik ben gek op tuinieren, natuur en varen met mijn boot.
*******************************************************************************************
I like to start new things, and there is  Airbnb 1 of them. I've had some rooms to students rented, but I actually think this is more fun. I like to make my home cozy for other people so that they feel at home here. 
I love gardening, nature and sailing with my boat.

name_right: big bedroom with view on the park and water
description_right:
you will enjoy the house because behind the house is a park were you can have a nice walk and children can play. The
house is near the Arena, Ziggo dome, Heineken music hall. And 30 minutes from centre of Amsterdam.
the room is suitable for couples, solo-avonturiers, bussines travelar . 3rd person on request.

The space
The House has a spacious living room and kitchen with water view and green park to make a walk. There is a double bed, and on request an 1 persons bed extra or childbed. Private sink and mini-refrigerator. There is a radio dvd player with tapes and a senseo coffee machine.
There are 2 more berooms for renting.
Toilet and shower, living room and kitchen are shared.
Landlady is present on her privat downfloor.

Guest access
bedroom, livingroom, kitchen, garden.
Owner has access to the living room and kitchen for the plants, thermostat stove and washing machine.

neighborhood_overview_right: there is a local market on tuesday.
host_about_right:
Ik onderneem graag nieuwe dingen, en daar is Airbnb er 1 van. ik heb wel eens kamers aan studenten verhuurd, maar eigenlijk vind ik dit wel leuker. Ik vind het leuk om mijn huis gezellig te maken voor andere mensen zodat zij zich hier thuis voelen. 

Ik ben gek op tuinieren, natuur en varen met mijn boot.
*******************************************************************************************
I like to start new things, and there is  Airbnb 1 of them. I've had some rooms to students rented, but I actually think this is more fun. I like to make my home cozy for other people so that they feel at home here. 
I love gardening, nature and sailing with my boat.

name_left: big bedroom with view on the park and water
description_left:
you will enjoy the house because behind the house is a park were you can have a nice walk and children can play. The
house is near the Arena, Ziggo dome, Heineken music hall. And 30 minutes from centre of Amsterdam.
the room is suitable for couples, solo-avonturiers, bussines travelar . 3rd person on request.

The space
The House has a spacious living room and kitchen with water view and green park to make a walk. There is a double bed, and on request an 1 persons bed extra or childbed. Private sink and mini-refrigerator. There is a radio dvd player with tapes and a senseo coffee machine.
There are 2 more berooms for renting.
Toilet and shower, living room and kitchen are shared.
Landlady is present on her privat downfloor.

Guest access
bedroom, livingroom, kitchen, garden.
Owner has access to the living room and kitchen for the plants, thermostat stove and washing machine.
It is intended that these

name_right: Green oasis in Amsterdam for 2 or 1
description_right:
The house is near Arena Stadion, Ziggo Dome, Heineken Music Hall, shops, metro and bus to the centre whithin 30 minutes. Behind the house there is a park. suitable for couples, solo-avonturiers, bussines people, familie and children.

The space
The bedroom with 2 single beds is on the second floor. There are 2 more bedrooms on this floor for the rental. The toilet and shower are shared. Nice view over the water and park.
It is not allowed to smoke or blow in the house.
De slaapkamer is op de 2e verdieping. Er zijn nog 2 slaapkamers op deze verdieping voor de verhuur. De wc en douche zijn gedeeld.
Het is niet toegestaan te roken in huis.

Guest access
kitchen, livingroom, garden, toilet/shower.
Owner has access to the living room and kitchen for the plants, thermostat stove and washing machine.
It is intended that these spaces remain neat , the owner appreciates this.

Other things to note
Er

name_left: The Lux at Leidse Square 2nd floor
description_left:
Als u op zoek bent naar een zeer centrale plek om te verblijven voor een vakantie met het hele gezin, heb je het gevonden. The lux at Leidse Square ligt op 150 meter van het Leidseplein en op 500 van het Rijksmuseum, Van Gogh museum en Stedelijk museum.

Wanneer de 2e etage niet beschikbaar is bekijk dan de beschikbaarheid van de 3e etage, de 2 verdiepingen zijn namelijk exact het zelfde!

The space
Het heeft 2 slaapkamers, een luxe badkamer met douche en toilet. Met een ruime woonkamer, een volledig moderne uitgeruste keuken en een balkon.
Het appartement is zeer uniek gelegen. De moderne open keuken met huiskamer is van alle gemakken voorzien.
De slaapkamer aan de achterkant heeft een eigen balkon. Ook is de badkamer luxe en mooi afgewerkt.

Guest access
Het appartement is volledig beschikbaar voor alleen gasten.

Other things to note
Het appartement is gelegen op de 2e verdieping, houdt rekening
neighborhood_overview_left: De buurt is fantastisch, alles wat je nodig hebt is in de buurt. Het Leidseplein, zeer leuke bars aan de overkant, Lux en Weber. Ook is de supermarkt op 6 minuten loopafstand.
host_about_left:
We manage and own shortstay licensed apartments on Marnixstraat.
Always looking to provide the best service for our guests.
Looking forward to your stay!

name_left: PH93 Amsterdam - Room P
description_left:
Bright, lovely en-suite room in a historical building close to Amsterdam Central station. The room has all you would need for a comfortable stay - nice shower, fridge, heating/AC in summer, cosy bed, fresh linens, etc.
It is few minutes walk to all attractions and transport. Central station is 3 mins walk - easy access to airport.
Recently renovated room in a monumental property. Old world charm with clean modern amenities. True Amsterdam experience!

The space
Small yet cosy bedroom at a great central location.
The bedroom has a comfortable double bed with high quality linens and cushions.
There is a television in the room with international channels and Netflix.
The room is equipped with minibar (with free beverages); in-room tea, coffee and snacks.
En-suite your private bathroom has rain shower, WC, hot & cold water, toiletries, hairdryer and fresh towels.
The room has day-n-night curtains, so perfect for day time lazing
neighborhood_overview_left:
Apartment is just across the Amsterdam Centraal station, located in the old historical town.
The neighborhood is lively with lots of cafes, bars and restaurants.
Well connected by public transport and very easy access to the airport.
amenities_left: ["Lock on bedroom door", "Carbon monoxide alarm", "First aid kit", "Refrigerator", "Smoke alarm", "Private entrance", "Cable TV", "TV", "Building staff", "Wifi", "Hot water", "Coffee maker", "Hangers", "Fire extinguisher", "Shampoo", "Luggage dropoff allowed", "Air conditioning", "Ethernet connection", "Iron", "Long term stays allowed", "Dedicated workspace", "Dryer", "Essentials", "Extra pillows and blankets", "Bed linens", "Hair dryer", "Heating", "Washer"]
name_right: PH93 Amsterdam - Room H
description_right:
Bright, cosy room with private bathroom, opposite Amsterdam central station.

Top location with easy access to all sights and nightlife, you will never need to take a cab. Close to conference centre Beurs van Berlage (3 mins walk), Dam Square, most Museums and easy access to Tulip gardens.

Good quality bed, rain shower, toiletries, daily turn-down service. Minibar in room, tea/coffee & snacks. Recently renovated to top quality, in a charming period property in historical city centre.

The space
Bedroom with attached bathroom, great city views.

Guest access
Guests have their own keys to access the property and there is lock on the door.
There is no kitchen but a fridge in the room, a kettle and nespresso machine.

Other things to note
Please note steep stairs (only 15) to access the room.
neighborhood_overview_right: Historical city centre, Walking distance to all musuems and sights. Great location to go out. Very safe.

name_left: Piet Mondriaan apartment street view
description_left: The modernly furnished, one bedroom, Piet Mondriaan apartment has a street view. The Piet Mondriaan apartment is located at the beautiful canal Keizersgracht, in the city centre of Amsterdam. It is near the main attractions, like the Rijksmuseum and many more. From here you can easily get to the RAI congress centre.
neighborhood_overview_left:
Spiegelkwartier

The Spiegelkwartier is the Art and Antiques district in Amsterdam.
Here you‚Äôll find more than 70 antiques dealers and art galleries, together offering a resplendent array of fine historical objects, classic and contemporary art, and exotic folk art.
You will find also restaurants, casual eateries and cosy caf√©s on almost every corner.
The Spiegelkwartier is located between the Herengracht and the Rijksmuseum.

www.spiegelkwartier.nl

Museum Quarter

The Amsterdam Museum Quarter is home to the three most important museums in the Netherlands: the Rijksmuseum, the Stedelijk Museum and the Van Gogh Museum.
It also houses the majestic Concertgebouw and some superb caf√©s and restaurants.
With its large grassy open area, the Museumplein offers plenty of room to have a picnic or just relax. The Museum Quarter even has its own indoor swimming pool.
And a visit isn‚Äôt complete without posing with, or on, th

name_left: Houseboat, B&B in the back stern (BK 53).
description_left:
B&B BK 53 consists of the partly original rear end of the ship, with the small kitchen and bathroom in the former engine room. And literally on top of this, the use of the wheelhouse or captain's cabin. You will have your own entrance from there.

The space
This 'flagship', the houseboat where I have been living in for over forty years now, contains two guestrooms, B&B BK53 in the very back end of the ship and B&B BK52 under the newly constructed forecastle.
(See my profile for the other B&B's availability).

"A dream location for couples traveling together".

The originally sailing Dutch barge, type Hagenaar, was later converted to a motor ship and is now moored on the River Amstel, functioning as a houseboat only.
(Its engine was taken out in 2006 and added to the collection of an engine museum). Aboard are, at its both ends, two neatly done guestrooms.

This room is at the backside. It includes the use of the wheelhou
neighborhood_overview_left: The ship is, right in the center of Amsterdam, moored in the river Amstel,  close to the famous Skinny Bridge. Basicly most of what you want to see or visit is on walking distance 'around the corner'.
host_about_left: Ik ben een man die met pensioen is, heb velerlei beroepen uitgeoefend, van therapeut tot timmerman, ben al decennia op het spirituele pad, volg een Tao training en vermaak mij prima.  Heb ook een website en schrijf blogs, zowel in het Engels als in het Nederlands.  (Website hidden by Airbnb)

name_right: Houseboat, B&B frontal stern (BK 52).
description_right:
B&B BK 52 consists of the newly created forecastle, (sitting room with the small kitchen and bathroom) with the double bed in the frontal stern of the ship. It has its own private entrance.

The space
This 'flagship', the houseboat where I have been living in for over forty years now, contains two guestrooms, this one is the B&B BK52 under the newly constructed forecastle.
(The other one is the B&B BK53 in the very back end of the ship. See my profile for the other B&B's availability).

"A dream location for couples traveling together".

The originally sailing Dutch barge, type Hagenaar, was later converted to a motor ship and is now moored on the River Amstel, functioning as a houseboat only.
(Its engine was taken out in 2006 and added to the collection of an engine museum). Aboard are, at its both ends, two neatly done guestrooms.

name_left: Houseboat, B&B frontal stern (BK 52).
description_left:
B&B BK 52 consists of the newly created forecastle, (sitting room with the small kitchen and bathroom) with the double bed in the frontal stern of the ship. It has its own private entrance.

The space
This 'flagship', the houseboat where I have been living in for over forty years now, contains two guestrooms, this one is the B&B BK52 under the newly constructed forecastle.
(The other one is the B&B BK53 in the very back end of the ship. See my profile for the other B&B's availability).

"A dream location for couples traveling together".

The originally sailing Dutch barge, type Hagenaar, was later converted to a motor ship and is now moored on the River Amstel, functioning as a houseboat only.
(Its engine was taken out in 2006 and added to the collection of an engine museum). Aboard are, at its both ends, two neatly done guestrooms.

The space
This 'flagship', the houseboat where I have been living in for over forty years now, contains two guestrooms, B&B BK53 in the very back end of the ship and B&B BK52 under the newly constructed forecastle.

name_left: Beautiful apartment in rural A'dam, free bikes!
description_left:
Light, elegant apartment with nice view over meadow and garden. The apartment has a beautiful bathroom with a claw foot tub, a large bed and spacious kitchen. My farmhouse is situated in a recreational area on the outskirts of Amsterdam. Still, public transport or preferably cycling will get you anywhere in the city. Bikes are free to use!
The area is green and rich in birds and smaller mammals. Parking is free of course and on the property.

The space
The Kingsize bed is Tempur, so superlarge and comfortable. The bathroom is beautifully romantic. The bedroom has a door to the terras and garden and a door to the kitchen and bathroom.

Guest access
You will have your own apartment, so a bedroom, bathroom and kitchen to yourself. The washing machine and dryer are in a shared space.

Other things to note
At the moment there is construction work going on at the Haarlemmerweg. you can still reach the house by car but (Ub
neighborhood_overview_left: The house is situated in the recreational area "Tuinen van West". Allthough it's close to the road, inside you don't hear it. Because there is a small nature reservation bto the north and the area is verry green, there are some typical and rare animals to be found.

name_right: Light, rural apartment with free bikes!
description_right:
The apartment in my farmhouse is very bright and warm. It has what you need for a pleasant visit to Amsterdam. The feel is home-like with a nod to the Dutch farms of the north. The kitchen is equipped with what you need to cook or make breakfast. The surroundings are surprisingly green. The house is situated in a recreational area, just opposite of a small nature-reservation. The city is easily reached with the free bikes. Public transport runs at night, cycling is the Dutch way!

The space
Het appartement ligt in het groen in Amsterdam. Daarom is het fijn thuiskomen na een drukke dag of nacht in de stad. Je kan even rustig op het terras wat drinken of wat geiten voeren in de wei. In het voorjaar zingen er veel vogels. Vanwege de natuurlijke omgeving zijn we rijk aan veel zeldzame soorten. Dit verwacht je misschien niet bij Amsterdam, maar je kunt het poldertje in wandelen of heel makkelijk de stad uit fietsen. Met de auto ben je zo bij zee of andere bezienswaard
neighborhood_overview_right: Mijn huis in Noordhollandse stolpvorm dateert deels uit 1927. De ligging is aan de Haarlemmerweg op een hoger gelegen deel van een geul die vroeger het Ij met de zee verbond. De lager gelegen polder is rond 1930 uitgeveend, de beste turf kwam hier vandaan. De polder heeft model gestaan voor de kavelindeling van de Flevopolder. Het huisje was gebouwd voor tijdelijke bewoning van het gezin van de botenbouwer van het veenbedrijf. In 2009 ben ik begonnen met de uitbouw tot stolp zodat het huis in de omgeving past. De buren wonen in een stolp uit 1909 die gebruikt is voor het stallen van vee. De aanlendende weilandjes worden beweid door Drentse heideschapen en Noord-Hollandse landgeiten. De naastgelegen woonwijken van Nieuw-West zijn door van Eesteren ontworpen. Het tegenoverliggende natuurgebied De Bretten is ontstaan door verwildering van opgespoten havengebied. Het is rijk aan bijzondere soorten vogels. Mijn huis is gelegen in de Tuinen van West, een nieuw recreatiegebied. In dit gebied

name_left: Houseboat.712; Coronaproof! Private airconditioned
description_left:
I finally did it! This brandnew houseboat is designed with you in mind. Meaning private entrance and amenities, sound proof walls and the best view in Amsterdam overlooking the Amstel River.
On the left you see the Grand Amstel Hotel and the Royal Theater Carre, opposite Amsterdam oldest rowing club.
The light is reflected over the water. Have you ever seen a Swan lifting up out of the water? Nature at its best straight in the center of the Pijp area with little restaurants and bars gallore.

The space
Staying in Amsterdam means staying in a houseboat. That is if you want that once in a lifetime oppertunity.
This boat has both. Luxury (floor heating, brandnew amenities) and the unique experience of staying at the water. The huge sliding windows can be opened fully on warm days and give you a wonderful view on the broad Amstel River. You can easily laze down in bed all day watching boats and birds pass by the window.

One wall is entire
neighborhood_overview_left:
The Pijp area is known as the vibrant, trendy part of Amsterdam. In walking distance there are nice little pubs and restaurants of all sorts but also a local market with flowers and food. You can rent a boat to explore the Amstel river.
Public transport is in walking distance. Trams will take you directly to the major museums like Van Gogh and An Frank (or you can even walk). Tram 4 will take you directly to the RAI congress Center. When you book I will give you my personal restaurant guide with my favourite restaurants.
host_about_left:
Being a traveler myself for as long as I can remember I feel I can relate to the people who are staying in my place. I‚Äôm a foodie and I love to spoil people. 
Building a houseboat has been a lifelong dream of mine, it has been built with you in mind so there are 2 separate rooms with a private entrance for my guests. The third room is my own and I wouldn't want to live anywhere else. Houseboat life is it! #houseboat712

name_left: Bed in 4 Bed Dorm Ensuite
description_left:
The space
Enjoy a spacious standard bunk room in our 18th century building that has been been transformed into one of the most notorious party spots in the Dutch capital. Complete with reading lights, USB ports and lockers under your bed to store your things, this is the perfect spot for for young backpackers to base themselves.

Known for our wild nights, there‚Äôs always something going on in our hostel party bar where we host awesome DJs and epic themed parties - so grab you friends and make the most an of our exclusive daily food and drink deals for hostel guests! For just ‚Ç¨4 a day you can cure that hangover with a full continental breakfast from 8am-10:30am followed by a FREE city walking tour!

Breakfast and all tours including the FREE city walking tour can be booked with our awesome reception team!

Guest access
Shared facilities available to our guests include a fully equipped kitchen (with free items such as oil, pasta etc.
host_about_left:
Our Flying Pig Downtown hostel is the place to party in Amsterdam with the 18th century building having been transformed into one of the most notorious party spots in the Dutch capital. We host awesome DJ‚Äôs and epic themed parties boasting an indoor smoking area with a pillow stage! 

Located in the heart of the city centre next to Amsterdam Central Station, you will also find Dam Square, The Anne Frank House and the bustling Red Light District just a short stroll away. Our hostel also provides free use of the guest kitchen, luggage storage, free Wi-Fi, a book exchange and a buffet style continental breakfast available everyday for only ‚Ç¨5!

Known for our wild nights and a relaxed atmosphere during the day, we‚Äôre a popular spot for young backpackers to base themselves. There‚Äôs a reason we were rated the Best Hostel in the Netherlands in 2013 by TripAdvisor!

host_about_left:
The Flying Pig Uptown is a chilled out hostel in the centre of Amsterdam overlooking Vondelpark. Famous for its relaxed atmosphere during the day and party atmosphere in the night, this hostel is perfect for backpackers looking for a good time in the Dutch capital. Located in the heart of Amsterdam‚Äôs cultural district, we‚Äôre within walking distance to the Van Gogh Museum, the Rijksmuseum and the Stedelijk museum. We‚Äôre also a short stroll to the city‚Äôs coolest restaurants, bars and coffee shops!
 
In our hostel we have an epic party bar, plus we offer free Wi-Fi, luggage storage and a continental breakfast buffet everyday for just ‚Ç¨4. We have a mix of dorm rooms as well as private rooms for those looking for extra comfort.

Our multi award winning hostel has its own on-site party bar Belushi‚Äôs located directly below where guests can enjoy exclusive drink deals, Happy Hours & 25% off our awesome menu! We host live DJs, live sports and epic parties.

When it comes to sightseeing you won‚Äôt find a better location than with us. We‚Äôre a short walk from the Anne Frank House, The Rijksmuseum and Madame Tussauds.

We offer free WiFi, a range of dorms & private rooms to choose from and a 24hr reception for your convenience.

The space
Enjoy your own private space inside our quirky and exciting hostel, voted Amsterdam's most popular hostel at the 2011 Hoscars! Our cosy Private Single Ensuite bedrooms offer a homely feel right in the heart of the city with one-off themed artwork designs by talented up-and-coming artists. Complete with fresh linen, free towels and your own clean bathroom, this is the ideal room for those looking for a little more privacy.

This chilled out hostel has its own on-site party bar Belushi‚Äôs, where guests can make the most of daily drink deals, happy hours, live sports and parties! When it comes to sightseeing, we‚Äôre just a short walk from the Anne Frank House, The Rijksmuseum and Madame Tussauds. 

We offer free Wi-fi, a mix of dorm rooms and private rooms and a 24 hour reception so you can party as late as you like!

Our cosy Private Standard Double Ensuite rooms offer a homely feel right in the heart of the city with one-off themed artwork designs by talented up-and-coming artists. Complete with fresh linen, free towels and your own clean bathroom, this is the ideal room for those looking for a little more privacy.

When it comes to sightseeing you won‚Äôt find a better location than with us. We‚Äôre a short walk from the Anne Frank House, The Rijksmuseum and Madame Tussauds.

We offer free WiFi, a range of dorms & private rooms to choose from and a 24hr reception for your convenience.

The space
Enjoy this spacious modern POD dorm in in our award-winning hostel overlooking the bustling Red Light District. Equipped with fresh linen, privacy curtains, USB ports, reading lights at each bed and a bathroom ensuite, this is the perfect room for travellers looking to be connected to many of the most popular sites Amsterdam has to offer.

host_about_left:
St Christopher‚Äôs At The Winston is a centrally located party hostel in Amsterdam, just a 5 minute walk from Dam Square and Centraal station. Offering backpackers a home away from home in the Dutch capital, this is the perfect place to base yourself if you‚Äôre looking for fun budget accommodation in the heart of the city.

This chilled out hostel has its own on-site party bar Belushi‚Äôs, where guests can make the most of daily drink deals, happy hours, live sports and parties! When it comes to sightseeing, we‚Äôre just a short walk from the Anne Frank House, The Rijksmuseum and Madame Tussauds. 

We offer free Wi-fi, a mix of dorm rooms and private rooms and a 24 hour reception so you can party as late as you like!

host_about_right:
St Christopher‚Äôs At The Winston is a centrally located party hostel in Amsterdam, just a 5 minute walk from Dam Square and Centraal station. Offering backpackers a home away from home in the Dutch capital, this is the perfect place to base yourself if you‚Äôre looking for fun budget accommodation in the heart of the city.

This chilled out hostel has its own on-site party bar Belushi‚Äôs, where guests can make the most of daily drink deals, happy hours, live sports and parties! When it comes to sightseeing, we‚Äôre just a short walk from the Anne Frank House, The Rijksmuseum and Madame Tussauds. 

We offer free Wi-fi, a mix of dorm rooms and private rooms and a 24 hour reception so you can party as late as you like!

St Christopher‚Äôs At The Winston is a centrally located party hostel in Amsterdam, just a 5 minute walk from Dam Square and Centraal station. Offering backpackers a home away from home in the Dutch capital, this is the perfect place to base yourself if you‚Äôre looking for fun budget accommodation in the heart of the city.

This chilled out hostel has its own on-site party bar Belushi‚Äôs, where guests can make the most of daily drink deals, happy hours, live sports and parties! When it comes to sightseeing, we‚Äôre just a short walk from the Anne Frank House, The Rijksmuseum and Madame Tussauds. 

We offer free Wi-fi, a mix of dorm rooms and private rooms and a 24 hour reception so you can party as late as you like!

name_right: Small Twin Ensuite
description_right:
Our multi award winning hostel has its own on-site party bar Belushi‚Äôs located directly below where guests can enjoy exclusive drink deals, Happy Hours & 25% off our awesome menu! We host live DJs, live sports and epic parties.

When it comes to sightseeing you won‚Äôt find a better location than with us. We‚Äôre a short walk from the Anne Frank House, The Rijksmuseum and Madame Tussauds.

We offer free WiFi, a range of dorms & private rooms to choose from and a 24hr reception for your convenience.

The space
Enjoy your own private space inside our quirky and exciting hostel, voted Amsterdam's most popular hostel at the 2011 Hoscars! Our cosy Private Small Twin Ensuite rooms offer a homely feel right in the heart of the city with one-off themed artwork designs by talented up-and-coming artists. Complete with fresh linen, free towels and your own clean bathroom, this is the ideal room for those looking for a little more privacy.

Enjoy your own private space inside our quirky and exciting hostel, voted Amsterdam's most popular hostel at the 2011 Hoscars! Our cosy Private Standard Double Ensuite rooms offer a homely feel right in the heart of the city with one-off themed artwork designs by talented up-and-coming artists. Complete with fresh linen, free towels and your own clean bathroom, this is the ideal room for those looking for a little more privacy.

Be
host_about_right:
St Christopher‚Äôs At The Winston is a centrally located party hostel in Amsterdam, just a 5 minute walk from Dam Square and Centraal station. Offering backpackers a home away from home in the Dutch capital, this is the perfect place to base yourself if you‚Äôre looking for fun budget accommodation in the heart of the city.

This chilled out hostel has its own on-site party bar Belushi‚Äôs, where guests can make the most of daily drink deals, happy hours, live sports and parties! When it comes to sightseeing, we‚Äôre just a short walk from the Anne Frank House, The Rijksmuseum and Madame Tussauds. 

We offer free Wi-fi, a mix of dorm rooms and private rooms and a 24 hour reception so you can party as late as you like!

Perfect room for 3 persons. The rooms is equipped with all the amenities needed for a comfortable and nice stay in our beautiful city. 24 hour reception, surrounded with bars cafes supermarket and the all so beautiful Vondelpark.

The space
We have a small Boutique hotel with a unique style of interior.
It is a family run business where service and personal attention is highly valued.

We are located in a local area where you will find yourself in a lively and urban part of Amsterdam.

Guest access
We have a 24 hour reception which is located next to the elevator where you can acces the room floors. If you want to work or enjoy the view with a nice cup of tea or coffee prepared by our staff, the restaurant is open 24 hours as well.

Other things to note
There is a elevator in the building where you can access every floor with our rooms.
Our property is a non smoking zone.

Oud west is a very urban and lively part of Amsterdam.
The area is very local and unique due to it's variety of small shop owners who are specialist in what the sell or offer :) You can relax in the beautiful Vondelpark or just walk around the area visit no mainstream hidden shops.

name_left: 1 Canal View Studio 1st Floor
description_left:
Prince Canal BnB is situated in the center of Amsterdam looking over a canal on the Princengracht. The small studio room comes with a seating area that looks over the canal where you can relax and watch the typical Amsterdam life style go by.

The space
Prince Canal BnB is situated in the center of Amsterdam looking over a canal on the Princengracht. The small studio room comes with a seating area that looks over the canal where you can relax and watch the typical Amsterdam life style go by.





The narrow canals and streets of trendy Jordaan are flanked by indie boutiques, cozy pubs and hip eateries. Stalls at the Noordermarkt square market offer jewelry, clothes, antiques and organic food. Antiques Centre Amsterdam sells vintage ceramics and paintings, while smaller galleries in the area focus on innovative contemporary art. Other attractions include the Houseboat Museum and the Amsterdam Cheese Museum.
host_about_left: Hello, would you like to stay on an Amsterdam canal? Please check the calendar and get in touch: I look forward to hearing from you!

name_left: Cozy room with private bathroom | Corona proof
description_left:
Cozy room with a queen-size double bed, private large bathroom and 'modern chic' shared living. Located next to the lively Leidseplein (City Centre), with the scenic and world-famous Canals of Amsterdam just around the corner.

Due to Covid-19, we‚Äôre taking extra care to disinfect frequently touched surfaces between reservations. Disinfection and disposable wipes are at your disposal.

The space
We would love to be the one to host you and share an unforgettable experience of Amsterdam with you. Our subtle stylised and luxurious apartment will contribute to the comfort of your stay. But most of all we like to make your trip a personal and local experience.

Guest access
Next to your private bedroom and private bathroom (which is only used for the laundry and connected via the living room), you will have access to the shared luxurious living and fully equipped kitchen. Wi-Fi is available throughout the apartment and there is the possi
neighborhood_overview_left: You simply can't stay at a more central place than the Leidseplein. The apartment is located between the square and the Leidsegracht and offers all of Amsterdam around the corner. Whether you are looking for the beauty of the Canal District, the exciting nightlife or one off the maestro's in the museums (eg. Rijksmuseum, Van Gogh museum, Anne Frank).
host_about_left: Living in a great city with my roommates Rutger and Tessa. Enjoying al the beautiful things Amsterdam has to offer. Love to chat about life, with a good glass of wine, meeting new friends from all over the world via Airbnb.

name_left: Kamer aan de mooiste gracht van Amsterdam
description_left:
Gastenverblijf in monumentaal pand aan rustige gracht in hartje Amsterdam (Jordaan), direct om de hoek bij het achterhuis van Anne Frank en de Westerkerk, uitkijkend op de Bloemgracht. Alles is vlakbij om van te genieten!

The space
Je komt met de trap op de 1e verdieping waar de gastenkamer is. Volledig gemoderniseerd met een authentieke touch. Een heerlijk bed, een eigen badkamer en koffie&thee apparaat beschikbaar. Uiteraard is er WIFI aanwezig met TV en een speaker.
neighborhood_overview_left: Het is een hele rustige en fijne buurt. Je hebt hier de echte 'Amsterdamse' experience. Niet geschikt voor feestjes.
host_about_left: Hi, mijn naam is Tessa en graag verwelkom ik jou bij mij thuis! Op de mooiste gracht van Amsterdam!
property_type_left: Private room in bed and breakfast
