name_left: Lightship Amsterdam, the iconic Upper Store
description_left:
Our B&B suites are situated on a beautiful characteristic, seventy years old British Lightship. The ship is moored in the creative North of Amsterdam, minutes from the historic city centre. Our guests have their own entrance and the entire front deck as their terrace. The spacious suites have been designed by a prizewinning architect. Each suite has a comfortable king-size bed, a private bathroom and a minibar. The delightful view from the deck covers the industrial city and the lighthouse.

The space
The UPPER STORE is located in the former storage room of the lightship. A glass volume follows the curves of the prow and the beauty of the space is complete. Bold switches, bulky pints of light are interspersed with the slenderness of the glass. A large bath is placed in the room. On the left a sturdy pantry and a robust bathroom with a toilet, sink and large shower. Each suite has a comfortable king-size bed, dining table and a minibar.

Other things t
neighborhood_overview_left: The North of Amsterdam is directly across the water behind the Central Station of Amsterdam. It is raw, hip, and also quiet. Has cutting-edge architecture, exciting festivals, artist studios and stylish waterside hangouts with beautiful terraces. A free ferry brings you in minutes to Central Station and the centre city of Amsterdam.

description_right:
Our B&B suites are situated on a beautiful characteristic, seventy year old British Lightship. The ship is moored in the creative North of Amsterdam, minutes from the historic city centre. Our guests have their own entrance and the entire front deck as their terrace. The spacious suites have been designed by a prizewinning architect. Each suite has a comfortable king size bed, a private bathroom and minibar. The delightful view from the deck covers the industrial city and the lighthouse.

The space
The MACHINERY SPACE is located in the belly of the ship. This place is breath taking and delightful. A glass volume is placed as a loose unit in the belly of the ship. The glass gives the room a pleasant climate, but the rawness of the ship remains visible on all sides. The sturdy metal parts, the rivets and the trusses are visible from all sides. Bold switches, bulky pints of light are interspersed with the slenderness of the glass. Each suite has a comfortable king si

Each suite has a comfortable king size bed, a private bathroom and minibar. The delightful view from the deck covers the industrial city and the lighthouse.

The space
The MACHINERY SPACE is located in the belly of the ship. This place is breath taking and delightful. A glass volume is placed as a loose unit in the belly of the ship. The glass gives the room a pleasant climate, but the rawness of the ship remains visible on all sides. The sturdy metal parts, the rivets and the trusses are visible from all sides. Bold switches, bulky pints of light are interspersed with the slenderness of the glass. Each suite has a comfortable king si
neighborhood_overview_left: The North of Amsterdam is directly across the water behind the Central Station of Amsterdam. It is raw, hip, and also quiet. Has cutting-edge architecture, exciting festivals, artist studios and stylish waterside hangouts with beautiful terraces. A free ferry brings you in minutes to Central Station and the centre city of Amsterdam.

name_right: Lightship Amsterdam, the iconic Upper Store
description_right:
Our B&B suites are situated on a beautiful characteristic, seventy years old British Lightship. The ship is moored in the creative North of Amsterdam, minutes from the historic city centre. Our guests have their own entrance and the entire front deck as their terrace. The spacious suites have been designed by a prizewinning architect. Each suite has a comfortable king-size bed, a private bathroom and a minibar. The delightful view from the deck covers the industrial city and the lighthouse.

The space
The UPPER STORE is located in the former storage room of the lightship. A glass volume follows the curves of the prow and the beauty of the space is complete. Bold switches, bulky pints of light are interspersed with the slenderness of the glass. A large bath is placed in the room. On the left a sturdy pantry and a robust bathroom with a toilet, sink and large shower. Each suite has a comfortable king-size bed, dining table and a minibar.

Other things t
neighborhood_overview_right: The North of Amsterdam is directly across the water behind the Central Station of Amsterdam. It is raw, hip, and also quiet. Has cutting-edge architecture, exciting festivals, artist studios and stylish waterside hangouts with beautiful terraces. A free ferry brings you in minutes to Central Station and the centre city of Amsterdam.

Dream away with the richly coloured interior, the crystal chandeliers, the luxurious fabrics and the expressive prints. Hotel Esther√©a will allow you to relax and it's also the perfect starting point fir discovering and exploring the city, as it's located right in the very heart of Amsterdam>

name_left: STAY HIP IN OUR SEMI-PRIVATE BUNK POD FOR 1
description_left:
BUNK Hotel Amsterdam is situated in the hip, up-and-coming neighbourhood of Amsterdam Noord, based in the former St. Rita church just 5 minutes from Amsterdam Central Station. BUNK bridges the gap between hotels and hostels by combining affordable luxury rooms and smartly designed semi-private pods, whilst creating a place for communal wonderment, with inclusive events housed in our sustainable restaurant and other shared areas. BUNK... a gathering place for travellers, locals and artists alike!

The space
Flying solo and looking for an undisturbed night‚Äôs rest? Forget about hostel dorms and get into our BUNK Pod for 1. Enjoy maximum privacy at minimum cost, without compromising on quality or comfort. Smartly designed so that you don‚Äôt have to squeeze tight to sleep tight.

Guest access
Our restaurant is the perfect place to hang out, all day long. After breakfast, pop open your laptop or meet for a nice lunch. Once the sun sets, there are al
neighborhood_overview_left: Just minutes by free ferry from Central Station lies Amsterdam North. This neighbourhood is alive and kicking, bursting with cultural hotspots. Authentic urban life lives on, too, still undiscovered by tourists.The Saint Rita church has always been a place where the North comes together. Now, it‚Äôs also where you‚Äôll find BUNK Amsterdam. This monumental building is now home to 296 guests, 106 rooms, 50 private pods, eight communal dinner tables and one teddy bear. So come to the North Side, where we have cookies, and company. On top of that, you‚Äôll be sleeping in a church, a unique experience in Amsterdam!

BUNK bridges the gap between hotels and hostels by combining affordable luxury rooms and smartly designed private bunk beds.
We converted two monumental churches into meeting places for travellers, locals and artists alike. We host inclusive social events in our sustainable restaurant and other communal spaces.

We aim to redefine hospitality by creating a place for communal wonderment. Where those who wander will start to wonder, triggered by true art, honest food and sincere smiles. We make comfort and design available to everyone, without the need for deep pockets. BUNK is where you can feel free to be your wonderfully weird self as you play your part in new stories you can take home with you.

Authentic urban life lives on, too, still undiscovered by tourists.The Saint Rita church has always been a place where the North comes together. Now, it‚Äôs also where you‚Äôll find BUNK Amsterdam. BUNK Hotel Amsterdam is situated in the hip, up-and-coming neighbourhood of Amsterdam Noord, based in the former St. Rita church just 5 minutes from Amsterdam Central Station. BUNK bridges the gap between hotels and hostels by combining affordable luxury rooms and smartly designed semi-private pods, whilst creating a place for communal wonderment, with inclusive events housed in our sustainable restaurant and other shared areas. BUNK... a gathering place for travellers, locals and artists alike!

The space
Our nicest room isn‚Äôt merely our biggest, it is also our spatial definition of epicness. Do you want the one with the round tub, the personal garden or maybe with the chill roof terrace? Pick your poison and your partner, because everything is better with friends.

Guest access
Our restaurant is the perfect place to hang out, all day long. After breakfast, pop open your laptop or meet for a nice lunch. Once the sun sets, there are always cu
neighborhood_overview_right: Just minutes by free ferry from Central Station lies Amsterdam North. This neighbourhood is alive and kicking, bursting with cultural hotspots. Authentic urban life lives on, too, still undiscovered by tourists.The Saint Rita church has always been a place where the North comes together. Now, it‚Äôs also where you‚Äôll find BUNK Amsterdam. This monumental building is now home to 296 guests, 106 rooms, 50 private pods, eight communal dinner tables and one teddy bear. So come to the North Side, where we have cookies, and company. On top of that, you‚Äôll be sleeping in a church, a unique experience in Amsterdam!
host_about_right:
BUNK bridges the gap between hotels and hostels by combining affordable luxury rooms and smartly designed private bunk beds.
We converted two monumental churches into meeting places for travellers, locals and artists alike. We host inclusive social events in our sustainable restaurant and other communal spaces.

We aim to redefine hospitality by creating a place for communal wonderment. Where those who wander will start to wonder, triggered by true art, honest food and sincere smiles. We make comfort and design available to everyone, without the need for deep pockets. BUNK is where you can feel free to be your wonderfully weird self as you play your part in new stories you can take home with you.
amenities_right: ["Wifi", "Shampoo", "Hair dryer", "Building staff", "TV", "Heating"]

We converted two monumental churches into meeting places for travellers, locals and artists alike. We host inclusive social events in our sustainable restaurant and other communal spaces.

We aim to redefine hospitality by creating a place for communal wonderment. Where those who wander will start to wonder, triggered by true art, honest food and sincere smiles. We make comfort and design available to everyone, without the need for deep pockets. BUNK is where you can feel free to be your wonderfully weird self as you play your part in new stories you can take home with you.
amenities_left: ["Wifi", "Shampoo", "Hair dryer", "Building staff", "TV", "Heating"]
name_right: STAY FABULOUS IN OUR MOST EPIC ROOM WITH EN-SUITE
description_right:
BUNK Hotel Amsterdam is situated in the hip, up-and-coming neighbourhood of Amsterdam Noord, based in the former St. Rita church just 5 minutes from Amsterdam Central Station. BUNK bridges the gap between hotels and hostels by combining affordable luxury rooms and smartly designed semi-private pods, whilst creating a place for communal wonderment, with inclusive events housed in our sustainable restaurant and other shared areas. BUNK... a gathering place for travellers, locals and artists alike!

The space
Our nicest room isn‚Äôt merely our biggest, it is also our spatial definition of epicness. Do you want the one with the round tub, the personal garden or maybe with the chill roof terrace? Pick your poison and your partner, because everything is better with friends.

Guest access
Our restaurant is the perfect place to hang out, all day long. After breakfast, pop open your laptop or meet for a nice lunch. Once the sun sets, there are always cu
neighborhood_overview_right: Just minutes by free ferry from Central Station lies Amsterdam North. This neighbourhood is alive and kicking, bursting with cultural hotspots. Authentic urban life lives on, too, still undiscovered by tourists.The Saint Rita church has always been a place where the North comes together. Now, it‚Äôs also where you‚Äôll find BUNK Amsterdam. This monumental building is now home to 296 guests, 106 rooms, 50 private pods, eight communal dinner tables and one teddy bear. So come to the North Side, where we have cookies, and company. On top of that, you‚Äôll be sleeping in a church, a unique experience in Amsterdam!

Authentic urban life lives on, too, still undiscovered by tourists.The Saint Rita church has always been a place where the North comes together. Now, it‚Äôs also where you‚Äôll find BUNK Amsterdam. This monumental building is now home to 296 guests, 106 rooms, 50 private pods, eight communal dinner tables and one teddy bear. So come to the North Side, where we have cookies, and company. On top of that, you‚Äôll be sleeping in a church, a unique experience in Amsterdam!
host_about_left:
BUNK bridges the gap between hotels and hostels by combining affordable luxury rooms and smartly designed private bunk beds.
We converted two monumental churches into meeting places for travellers, locals and artists alike. We host inclusive social events in our sustainable restaurant and other communal spaces.

We aim to redefine hospitality by creating a place for communal wonderment. Where those who wander will start to wonder, triggered by true art, honest food and sincere smiles. BUNK is where you can feel free to be your wonderfully weird self as you play your part in new stories you can take home with you.

BUNK Hotel Amsterdam is situated in the hip, up-and-coming neighbourhood of Amsterdam Noord, based in the former St. Rita church just 5 minutes from Amsterdam Central Station. BUNK bridges the gap between hotels and hostels by combining affordable luxury rooms and smartly designed semi-private pods, whilst creating a place for communal wonderment, with inclusive events housed in our sustainable restaurant and other shared areas. BUNK... a gathering place for travellers, locals and artists alike!

The space
Need a little more storage space? The BUNK Room + for 2 has just that, due to the smart lay-out. It‚Äôs still not too big in size, but huge in comfort and design. Want to fill that extra space with souvenirs? Ask our hosts for some shopping tips.

Guest access
Our restaurant is the perfect place to hang out, all day long. After breakfast, pop open your laptop or meet for a nice lunch. Once the sun sets, there are always cultural events to enj
neighborhood_overview_left: Just minutes by free ferry from Central Station lies Amsterdam North. This neighbourhood is alive and kicking, bursting with cultural hotspots. Authentic urban life lives on, too, still undiscovered by tourists.The Saint Rita church has always been a place where the North comes together. Now, it‚Äôs also where you‚Äôll find BUNK Amsterdam. This monumental building is now home to 296 guests, 106 rooms, 50 private pods, eight communal dinner tables and one teddy bear. So come to the North Side, where we have cookies, and company. On top of that, you‚Äôll be sleeping in a church, a unique experience in Amsterdam!
host_about_left:
BUNK bridges the gap between hotels and hostels by combining affordable luxury rooms and smartly designed private bunk beds.
We converted two monumental churches into meeting places for travellers, locals and artists alike. We host inclusive social events in our sustainable restaurant and other communal spaces.

We aim to redefine hospitality by creating a place for communal wonderment. Where those who wander will start to wonder, triggered by true art, honest food and sincere smiles. We make comfort and design available to everyone, without the need for deep pockets. BUNK is where you can feel free to be your wonderfully weird self as you play your part in new stories you can take home with you.
amenities_left: ["Wifi", "Shampoo", "Hair dryer", "Building staff", "TV", "Heating"]

We converted two monumental churches into meeting places for travellers, locals and artists alike. We host inclusive social events in our sustainable restaurant and other communal spaces.

We aim to redefine hospitality by creating a place for communal wonderment. Where those who wander will start to wonder, triggered by true art, honest food and sincere smiles. We make comfort and design available to everyone, without the need for deep pockets. BUNK is where you can feel free to be your wonderfully weird self as you play your part in new stories you can take home with you.
amenities_right: ["Wifi", "Shampoo", "Hair dryer", "Building staff", "TV", "Heating"]

name_left: STAY STYLISH IN OUR EPIC BUNK ROOM WITH EN-SUITE
description_left:
BUNK Hotel Amsterdam is situated in the hip, up-and-coming neighbourhood of Amsterdam Noord, based in the former St. Rita church just 5 minutes from Amsterdam Central Station. BUNK bridges the gap between hotels and hostels by combining affordable luxury rooms and smartly designed semi-private pods, whilst creating a place for communal wonderment, with inclusive events housed in our sustainable restaurant and other shared areas. BUNK... a gathering place for travellers, locals and artists alike!

The space
You can find these EPIC BUNK Rooms in the most exquisite locations of our monumental church. All of them have historic details or special features. Waking up in this luxury, don‚Äôt forget that there‚Äôs a lot to experience outside the room.

Guest access
Our restaurant is the perfect place to hang out, all day long. After breakfast, pop open your laptop or meet for a nice lunch. Once the sun sets, there are always cultural events to enjoy, org
neighborhood_overview_left: Just minutes by free ferry from Central Station lies Amsterdam North. This neighbourhood is alive and kicking, bursting with cultural hotspots. Authentic urban life lives on, too, still undiscovered by tourists.The Saint Rita church has always been a place where the North comes together. Now, it‚Äôs also where you‚Äôll find BUNK Amsterdam. This monumental building is now home to 296 guests, 106 rooms, 50 private pods, eight communal dinner tables and one teddy bear. So come to the North Side, where we have cookies, and company. On top of that, you‚Äôll be sleeping in a church, a unique experience in Amsterdam!

Authentic urban life lives on, too, still undiscovered by tourists.The Saint Rita church has always been a place where the North comes together. Now, it‚Äôs also where you‚Äôll find BUNK Amsterdam. host_about_right:
BUNK bridges the gap between hotels and hostels by combining affordable luxury rooms and smartly designed private bunk beds.
We converted two monumental churches into meeting places for travellers, locals and artists alike. We host inclusive social events in our sustainable restaurant and other communal spaces.

We aim to redefine hospitality by creating a place for communal wonderment. Where those who wander will start to wonder, triggered by true art, honest food and sincere smiles. We make comfort and design available to everyone, without the need for deep pockets. BUNK is where you can feel free to be your wonderfully weird self as you play your part in new stories you can take home with you.
